article.title: Raytheon Receives Scout Surveillance System Contract
article.text: Raytheon Co., McKinney, Texas, was awarded a $26,990,015 cost-plus-fixed-fee, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract to update and configure Block 0 Long Range Advanced Scout Surveillance System (LRAS3) sight sensors to the Block 1 Netted LRAS3 sight sensor, configuration of up to 100 LRAS3 units. Funding and work location will be determined with each order with an estimated completion date of May 4, 2017. Bids were solicited via the Internet with one received. Army Contracting Command, Alexandria, Virginia, is the contracting activity (W909MY-15-D-0006.?
